DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Extended Infusion Set Wear Using Medtronic Extended Wear Sof-set Infusion Set
DOC.detailed_description: This double blind cross-over study . Subjects ask wear infusion set either standard infusion set extend wear infusion set . They wear infusion set twice , order infusion set wear randomized first infusion set wear alternated 4 week . By perform cross study use experimental infusion set standard infusion set , investigator hope see whether benefit use extend wear infusion set .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Clinical diagnosis type 1 diabetes least one year use insulin pump least 12 month 2 . The diagnosis type 1 diabetes base investigator 's judgment ; Cpeptide level antibody determination need . 3 . Age 18 55 year 4 . Hemoglobin A1c level less equal 8.5 % 5 . Willing use Novolog insulin participate study 6 . Total daily insulin dose least 0.3 units/kg/day 7 . For female , currently know pregnant 8 . An understanding willingness follow protocol sign inform consent 9 . Willingness wear experimental insulin infusion set throughout study 10 . Must able understand speak write English 1 . Diabetic ketoacidosis past 3 month 2. blood urea nitrogen ( BUN ) , Creatinine , liver function test ( ALT AST ) three time upper limit normal , thrombocytopenia 3 . Severe hypoglycemia result seizure loss consciousness 3 month prior enrollment 4 . Pregnant lactating female 5 . Known tape allergies 6 . Current treatment seizure disorder 7 . Cystic fibrosis 8 . Active infection 9 . A known medical condition judgment investigator might interfere completion protocol follow example : 10 . Inpatient psychiatric treatment past 6 month either subject subject 's primary care giver ( i.e. , parent guardian ) 11 . Presence known adrenal disorder 12 . If antihypertensive , thyroid , antidepressant lipid lower medication , lack stability medication past 2 month prior enrollment study 13 . Abuse alcohol 14 . Dialysis renal failure
